description:
For river running, the medium power forgives misplaced plants or eddy ambushes, while the high performance dihedral lets you exercise precise control whether you’re a beginner or an expert.

  • Light carbon fibre shaft
  • Durable fiberglass/nylon blades
  • Blade shape suits whitewater paddlers, with a design that promotes a powerful stroke
  • Soft Advantage Grips dampen vibration
  • 7 degree wrist offset reduces shoulder fatigue and strain on your forearms
  • Ergonomically shaped grips promote proper hand placement
name: Accent Rage Advantage Grip Paddle
